  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120528</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120528</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Razpoznaj neznano  porazdelitev naboja</string>
            <string language="en">Identify the hidden charge distribution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen Sie die versteckte Ladung Verteilung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identifiez la distribution cachée de charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identifique a distribuição escondida da carga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identifichi la distribuzione nascosta della 
carica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορίστε την κρυμμένη διανομή δαπανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Identifique la distribución ocultada de la carga</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Različni naboji povzočajo drugače oblike električnega polja.</string>
            <string language="en">Different point charged are causing different shapes of a resulting electric field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der unterschiedliche Punkt, der aufgeladen wird, 
verursachen unterschiedliche Formen eines Resultierens elektrisch 
auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le point différent chargé causent différentes 
formes d'un champ électrique résultant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ponto diferente carregado está causando formas 
diferentes de um campo elétrico resultante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il punto differente caricato sta causando le 
figure differenti di un campo elettrico risultante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διαφορετικό σημείο που χρεώνεται προκαλεί τις 
διαφορετικές μορφές ενός προκύπτοντος ηλεκτρικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversa punta cargada está causando diversas 
dimensiones de una variable de un campo eléctrico que resulta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δαπάνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carga eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
